de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.gui.controllers
Class PlayerScreenController

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.app.state.AbstractAppState
      de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.gui.controllers.AbstractScreenController
          de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.gui.controllers.PlayerScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme3.app.state.AppState, de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController
public class PlayerScreenController
extends AbstractScreenController

This is the screen controllers used during player setup of the game

This class provides the functionality to add players to the game.

The current game can be set running.

Author:
wladimir + saman + bernd

Field Summary
(package private)  de.lessvoid.nifty.controls.ListBox<java.lang.String> playerBox
          List of player which already joined the game.
private  boolean startJoinedPlayerUpdate
          If true then the playerBox will be updated with the server information about joined players.
private  float timer
          This timer is currently used by update(float) to update the playerBox.
private  float UPDATE_INTERVALL_JOINED_PLAYERS
          Update intervall in seconds in which the playerBox shall be updated

update

public void update(float tpf)
Check each UPDATE_INTERVALL_JOINED_PLAYERS seconds if any user has joined. If two user join, then the game will be started automatically.

Specified by:
